item.title: Introduction to Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Reinforcement learning is an important type of Machine Learning where an agent learn how to behave in a environment by performing actions and seeing the results. The idea behind Reinforcement Learning is that an agent will learn from the environment by interacting with it and receiving rewards for performing actions. Learning from interaction with the environment comes from our natural experiences. Imagine youâ€™re a child in a living room. You see a fireplace, and you approach it.
